member.name: T:Recaptcha.Web.Mvc.RecaptchaMvcExtensions
member.summary: Represents the Recaptcha method extensions container for the and classes.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.Mvc.RecaptchaMvcExtensions.Recaptcha(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaTheme,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Renders the recaptcha HTML in an MVC view. It is an extension method to the class.
member.param: The object to which the extension is added.
Sets the public key of recaptcha.
Sets the language of recaptcha. If no language is specified, the language of the current UI culture will be used.
Sets the tab index of recaptcha.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the IHtmlString type.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.Mvc.RecaptchaMvcExtensions.GetRecaptchaVerificationHelper(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an instance of the class that can be used to verify user's response to the recaptcha's challenge.
member.param: The object to which the extension method is added to.
The private key required for making the recaptcha verification request.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the class.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.Mvc.RecaptchaMvcExtensions.GetRecaptchaVerificationHelper(System.Web.Mvc.Controller)
member.summary: Gets an instance of the class that can be used to verify user's response to the recaptcha's challenge.
member.param: The object to which the extension method is added to.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the class.

member.name: T:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaHtmlHelper
member.summary: Represents the functionality to generate recaptcha HTML.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: Sets the public key to be part of the recaptcha HTML.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: Sets the public key of the recaptcha HTML.
Sets the theme of the recaptcha HTML.
Sets the language of the recaptcha HTML.
Sets the tab index of the recaptcha HTML.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaHtmlHelper.ToString
member.summary: Gets the recaptcha's HTML that needs to be rendered in an HTML page.
member.returns: Returns the HTML as an instance of the type.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaHtmlHelper.PublicKey
member.summary: Gets the public key of the recaptcha HTML.

member.summary: Gets or sets the theme of the recaptcha HTML.

member.name: T:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationResult
member.summary: Represents the result value of recaptcha verification process.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationResult.UnknownError
member.summary: Verification failed but the exact reason is not known.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationResult.Success
member.summary: Verification succeeded.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationResult.IncorrectCaptchaSolution
member.summary: The user's response to recaptcha challenge is incorrect.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationResult.InvalidCookieParameters
member.summary: The request parameters in the client-side cookie are invalid.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationResult.InvalidPrivateKey
member.summary: The private supplied at the time of verification process is invalid.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationResult.NullOrEmptyCaptchaSolution
member.summary: The user's response to the recaptcha challenge is null or empty.

member.name: T:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationHelper
member.summary: Represents the functionality for verifying user's response to the recpatcha challenge.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationHelper.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: Sets the private key of the recaptcha verification request.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationHelper.VerifyRecaptchaResponse
member.summary: Verifies whether the user's response to the recaptcha request is correct.
member.returns: Returns the result as a value of the enum.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationHelper.VerifyRecaptchaResponseTaskAsync
member.summary: Verifies whether the user's response to the recaptcha request is correct.
member.returns: Returns the result as a value of the enum.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationHelper.PrivateKey
member.summary: Gets the privae key of the recaptcha verification request.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationHelper.UserHostAddress
member.summary: Gets the user's host address of the recaptcha verification request.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaVerificationHelper.Response
member.summary: Gets the user's response to the recaptcha challenge of the recaptcha verification request.

member.name: T:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha
member.summary: An ASP.NET control that wraps Google's recaptcha control.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Calls the OnLoad method of the parent class and initializes the internal state of the control for verification of the user's response to the recaptcha challenge.
member.param: The object passed to the Load event of the control.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: Redners the HTML output. This method is automatically called by ASP.NET during the rendering process.
member.param: The output object to which the method will write HTML to.
member.exception: The exception is thrown if the public key is not set.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.Verify
member.summary: Verifies the user's answer to the recaptcha challenge.
member.returns: Returns the verification result as enum value.
member.exception: The private key is null or empty.
The time-out period for the recaptcha verification request expired.

member.name: M:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.VerifyTaskAsync
member.summary: Verifies the user's answer to the recaptcha challenge.
member.returns: Returns the verification result as enum value.
member.exception: The private key is null or empty.
The time-out period for the recaptcha verification request expired.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.PublicKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the public key of the recaptcha control.
member.remarks: The value of the property is required. If the key is not set, a runtime exception will be thrown. The key can be set either directly as a literal value or as an appSettings key from the application configuration file. An appSettings key needs to be specified within {} curly braces.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.PrivateKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the private key of the recaptcha control.
member.remarks: The value of the property is required. If the key is not set, a runtime exception will be thrown. The key can be set either directly as a literal value or as an appSettings key from the application configuration file. An appSettings key needs to be specified within {} curly braces.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the theme of the recaptcha control.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the language of the recaptcha control.
member.remarks: If the property is not set then the language of the current UI culture will be used.

member.name: P:Recaptcha.Web.UI.Controls.Recaptcha.Response
member.summary: Gets the user's response to the recaptcha challenge.

member.name: T:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaTheme
member.summary: Represents the theme of an ASP.NET Recaptcha control.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaTheme.Red
member.summary: Red theme of the control.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaTheme.Blackglass
member.summary: Blackglass theme of the control.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaTheme.White
member.summary: White theme of the control.

member.name: F:Recaptcha.Web.RecaptchaTheme.Clean
member.summary: Clean theme of the control.
